title: Competing Models - height and arm span

content.question:
The x axis has no label or scale. The y axis is labeled Residuals with a horizontal line representing 0. 

There are 11 points plotted below the horizontal axis, one of which is significantly farther to the right than all other points.

There are 12 points plotted above the horizontal axis.

One point is labeled P. This point is in the middle of the rectangular window horizontally and towards the top vertically.

There is only one other point above the point labeled P.

There is no apparent pattern to the plotted points.

However, more points are located in the middle and on the left than other places.

​The students in a precalculus class measured each student’s height and arm span, in centimeters. The students calculated a linear regression <math alttext="y equals a plus b x"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> with heights as the input values and arm spans as the output values. The given residual plot has a point labeled <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> at coordinates <math alttext="open parentheses 175 , 23.4 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mn>175,23.4</mn></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What does point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> indicate in the context?

choices.label: ​Because point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is above the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis, for the student with a height of <math alttext="175"><semantics><mn>175</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> cm, the model overestimates the actual arm span value by <math alttext="23.4"><semantics><mn>23.4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> cm.

​​Because point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is above the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis, for the student with a height of <math alttext="175"><semantics><mn>175</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> cm, the model underestimates the actual arm span value by <math alttext="23.4"><semantics><mn>23.4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> cm.

Because point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is above the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis, for the student with an arm span of <math alttext="175"><semantics><mn>175</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> cm, the model overestimates the actual height value by <math alttext="23.4"><semantics><mn>23.4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> cm.

Because point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is above the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis, for the student with an arm span of <math alttext="175"><semantics><mn>175</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> cm, the model underestimates the actual height value by <math alttext="23.4"><semantics><mn>23.4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> cm.

content.answer: ​​Because point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is above the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis, for the student with a height of <math alttext="175"><semantics><mn>175</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> cm, the model underestimates the actual arm span value by <math alttext="23.4"><semantics><mn>23.4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> cm.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Support conclusions or choices with a logical rationale or appropriate data.
